title: I can't play a single game due to several problems
body:
First of all, I tried following the troubleshooting connection issues topic [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-windows) but nothing fixed my problems not only one problem but many.

First problem is after selecting a champion and going to the loading screen i freeze at 0% for about 10 seconds and then get the network message "You have been disconnected...." and if i try to reconnect the game about 1 million times i can't get in even if i restarted the client too.

Seconds problem is sometimes i get in the game normally but after 5 seconds even i couldn't buy anything yet (IG) my ping raises to 500 and attempting to reconnect message appear and if i restarted my game sometimes i get the dc problem (First one) and sometimes this problem happens again.

Third problem and this one i made it a temporary solution is i sometimes i may connect to a game but at the loading screen i notice my ping is 900 or something so i open the task manager and kill the lol client process then my ping immediately drops to its normal values.

I can't play a game nowadays i have been trying to join one game for 3 days now. 

I have windows 8.1 64-bit
Intel core i7 processor 
8 GB Ram
and AMD Radeon 2GB Graphic card

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like you may have a network issue on your hands that's failing to maintain a stable connection, and ultimately kicking you out.  It's really important that you go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and not some of it.  It's also important to try using a wired connection to rule out the possibility of a wifi connection problem.  

To help you out, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure some of your settings like your firewall.  You can also run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your case, which I'm assuming will involve packet loss problems.  No worries, as the reader will also provide troubleshooting steps for you.  Hopefully, these tools will get you back in-game without further issue!

Thanks for you comment.
Right now after many tries with everything i can the first two problems maybe have been solved.
but the third one which is that the lol client is consuming my network after the loading screen is very annoying and i need a solution for that if you can help :) thanks again

The third problem and all my problems gone after getting a wired connection and disabling the firewall..
Thanks for help
